• You may have heard that 
some women have, in the 
past, chosen not to eat 
peanuts while they were 
breastfeeding. This is 
because the government 
previously advised women 
that they may wish to avoid 
eating peanuts while they 
were breastfeeding if there 
was a history of allergy 
in their child’s immediate 
family (such as asthma, 
eczema, hayfever, food 
allergy or other types 
of allergy),
